com.douglasjose.tech.csv
Interface Csv

All Known Implementing Classes:
BasicCsv
public interface Csv

Data structure to represent a CSV (comma separated values) file as a matrix in memory. The data in the structure is addressed through indexes in the form (row, column).

Author:
Douglas Rodrigues

Method Summary
 void add(int row, int column, java.lang.String content)
          Add content to a indexed position in the matrix.

          Retrieves the number of rows in the matrix.

          Loads the file from a stream.

          Removes the content from a given position.

get

java.lang.String get(int row,
